name: DrinkBot
0:
”Alexa, start drink bot”
”Alexa, drink bot”
”Alexa, launch drink bot”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drink bot
Developer Terms of Use
des: The DrinkBot skill is used to connect Alexa to the DrinkBot system, and allow the DrinkBot system to execute its function from a verbal command. Prerequisites include the DrinkBot hardware system and internet connection. Features included are starting the DrinkBot operation and stopping the DrinkBot operation. Example of the DrinkBot operation is connecting the hardware to a external drink source by the user, setting user defined drink names from a hosted URL page by the DrinkBot system, placing a glass on the DrinkBot hardware designated area, invoking the DrinkBot skill and user defined drink name, removing the glass containing a pre-measured amount of liquid from the external drink source.
